title: Ep 140: Everybody Has a Beauty Story
itunes:title: Ep 140: Everybody Has a Beauty Story
itunes:subtitle: Allure editor in chief Michelle Lee is here to talk about her career, her favorite products, how to deal with negativity, and why she banned the term “anti-aging” in her magazine. Before that, we ponder Kendall Jenner’s Proactiv endorsement, Jess share...
description:
Allure editor in chief Michelle Lee is here to talk about her career, her favorite products, how to deal with negativity, and why she banned the term “anti-aging” in her magazine. Before that, we ponder Kendall Jenner’s Proactiv endorsement, Jess shares tips for dealing with fly-away hairs, and we discuss some controversial news about sunscreen and vitamin D. 


Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand

Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jennedit 

Twitter: @fatmascara 

Email: info@fatmascara.com 

Website: fatmascara.com

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.
